sense.def:
To recoil from something
pomeni čutiti grozo ali gnus ob nečem.

seg.quote: He recoiled in horror from the savagery which he witnessed.
Parents may recoil at this kind of behaviour.

sense.def:
To recoil
pomeni tudi odmakniti del telesa, ker nam nekaj povzroča neprijeten občutek.

seg.quote: When he touched the man's arm, he recoiled in horror, for it was cold and rigid.
